body_html:
Yeah, this is definitely fixed and you can even see it in the docs_src directory here on Github:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_linux.md

But it sometimes takes a while for these things to propagate to the root directory on tensorflow.org as we usually only update that with version releases.
body_text:
Yeah, this is definitely fixed and you can even see it in the docs_src directory here on Github:

But it sometimes takes a while for these things to propagate to the root directory on tensorflow.org as we usually only update that with version releases.
body:
Yeah, this is definitely fixed and you can even see it in the docs_src directory here on Github:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_linux.md

But it sometimes takes a while for these things to propagate to the root directory on tensorflow.org as we usually only update that with version releases.
